name: part_005
file: tmp_【#ラプラス生誕祭2023】特別番組：らぷらすといっしょ！みんなかつもくせよ！【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [MSIxNFblrCY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Opening of the program, Kanata is crying and acting like a child.
La+ Darknesss and Shirakami Fubuki introduce themselves, leading to a comedic marriage proposal.
Kazama Iroha introduces herself in her samurai persona while acting like a 'good child'.
Takane Lui introduces herself as the MC/Teacher and instructs everyone to sit down.
Lui explains the rules of the 'Drawing Song' (Ekaki Uta) challenge.
Lui announces the first topic for the drawing song: an elephant.
The contestants talk and joke while drawing their elephants.
Lui asks who wants to present first, and Amane Kanata is chosen.

subtitles.original: （泣き声）
subtitles.english: (Crying sounds)

subtitles.original: 泣かないで、泣かないで、かなたちゃん大丈夫、大丈夫。かなたちゃんのターンだから。
subtitles.english: Don't cry, don't cry, Kanata-chan, it's okay, it's okay. It's your turn.

subtitles.original: あ、えっと…頑張って、あの、握って…いきたいと思いまふ…
subtitles.english: Ah, well... I'll do my best to, um, hold on to things...

subtitles.original: あ、ぎゅっと握るんだ。はい、今日も頑張ってぎゅっきゅしていこうね。
subtitles.english: Ah, you're going to hold on tight. Right, let's work hard and squeeze things today too.

subtitles.original: ぎゅっきゅ！
subtitles.english: Squeeze, squeeze!

subtitles.original: あーい、よろしくー！
subtitles.english: Alright, nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: 俺の名前はラプラス・ダークネスです！
subtitles.english: My name is La+ Darknesss!

subtitles.original: れあべた！れあべた！
subtitles.english: Le-a-be-ta! Le-a-be-ta!

subtitles.original: 仲良いね。かなたちゃんとラプラスちゃんは仲良いのかな？
subtitles.english: You two get along well. I wonder if Kanata-chan and La+ chan are on good terms?

subtitles.original: 仲良くない！
subtitles.english: We're not!

subtitles.original: あ、そういうこと言わないの。ほら、みんな映ってるよ、映ってる。
subtitles.english: Ah, don't say things like that. Look, everyone's watching you on screen.

subtitles.original: 俺はフブキちゃんと結婚するのだ！
subtitles.english: I'm going to marry Fubuki-chan!

subtitles.original: あ、そうなの？なんかちょっと求婚されましたけど。
subtitles.english: Oh, is that so? I guess she just proposed to you.

subtitles.original: やだ！やだ！
subtitles.english: No! No!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、フブキちゃん、自己紹介できるかな？
subtitles.english: Now, Fubuki-chan, can you introduce yourself?

subtitles.original: 白上フブキです！結婚はしたくないです！
subtitles.english: I'm Shirakami Fubuki! I don't want to get married!

subtitles.original: ねえ、じゃあフブキちゃんは誰と結婚したいのかな？
subtitles.english: Hey, then who would Fubuki-chan want to marry?

subtitles.original: 誰ともしたくないということでございます！
subtitles.english: I don't want to marry anyone!

subtitles.original: ということで、ラプラスちゃんはちょっと振られたということで。
subtitles.english: So, it seems La+ chan was just rejected.

subtitles.original: あーん！あーん！
subtitles.english: Waaaah! Waaaah!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、いろはちゃんお願いします。
subtitles.english: Now, Iroha-chan, please.

subtitles.original: はい！ござるです！こんにちは！
subtitles.english: Yes! De-gozaru! Hello!

subtitles.original: 良い子なので、自己紹介がちゃんとできました！お姉ちゃん偉い？
subtitles.english: I'm a good girl, so I could introduce myself properly! Am I great, big sister?

subtitles.original: えらーい！一番えらーい！
subtitles.english: Great! You're the greatest!

subtitles.original: 今日も頑張るでござる！ラプラスちゃんには負けません！よろしくお願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best today too, de-gozaru! I won't lose to La+ chan! Please take care of me!

subtitles.original: 対決なのかな？えらい、えらい、えらい！すごいえらーい！
subtitles.english: A rivalry? Great, great, great! So great!

subtitles.original: みんな元気に挨拶できたねー。えらい、えらい。
subtitles.english: Everyone was able to introduce themselves energetically! Good job, good job.

subtitles.original: はい、そしてみんな元気？鷹嶺ルイお姉さんだよー！
subtitles.english: And, how is everyone doing? It's your big sister, Takane Lui!

subtitles.original: はい、キッズ共、早く座ってください。椅子用意してますんで、はい、座って。
subtitles.english: Okay kids, please sit down quickly. I've prepared seats, so sit down.

subtitles.original: もう押してるよ。押してるからね。座りなさい。
subtitles.english: We're already starting. We're already recording, so sit down.

subtitles.original: ということで、子供心を忘れていないみんなに、今から絵描き歌で誰が一番子供に近いか勝負してもらうよ！
subtitles.english: So, for all of you who haven't lost your childlike heart, we're going to have a drawing song battle to see who is the closest to a child!

subtitles.original: わーい！わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: みんな子供心忘れてないよね？
subtitles.english: You haven't forgotten your childlike heart, right?

subtitles.original: もちろんでございます！見ての通りだよ！
subtitles.english: Of course! Just as you see!

subtitles.original: ちょっと大人っぽい人いたけど大丈夫かな？今、もちろんでございますって言った人。
subtitles.english: Wait, someone sounded a bit adult just now, is it okay? The person who just said 'Of course' like that.

subtitles.original: いないよー。子供心を忘れていないということで合ってるかな？
subtitles.english: There's no one like that. So it's correct that you haven't forgotten your childlike heart?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫！大丈夫！みんな企画の趣旨わかってる！
subtitles.english: It's fine! It's fine! Everyone understands the purpose of the project!

subtitles.original: ビジネス子供！ビジネス子供！
subtitles.english: Business children! Business children!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、みんな、ルールは簡単！
subtitles.english: Alright everyone, the rules are simple!

subtitles.original: お姉さんがお題を発表するから、一番子供っぽい絵描き歌を即興で作れた人が1ポイントもらえます。
subtitles.english: I'll announce a topic, and the person who creates the most childlike drawing song on the spot gets 1 point.

subtitles.original: わかったかな？簡単でしょ？
subtitles.english: Got it? Simple, right?

subtitles.original: みんな準備はいいかな？
subtitles.english: Is everyone ready?

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで1つ目のお題はこちら！
subtitles.english: Alright, the first topic is this!

subtitles.original: ぞうさん
subtitles.english: Elephant

subtitles.original: ぞうさんです！
subtitles.english: Mr. Elephant!

subtitles.original: みんなぞうさん描けるかな？
subtitles.english: Can everyone draw an elephant?

subtitles.original: 描ける！描ける！描ける！
subtitles.english: I can! I can! I can!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、絵描き歌をみんなで考えていきましょう。シンキングタイム、スタート！
subtitles.english: Then, let's all think of a drawing song together. Thinking time, start!

subtitles.original: みんなはぞうさん好きかな？
subtitles.english: Do you all like elephants?

subtitles.original: 公園でぞうさん見つけたよ！
subtitles.english: I found an elephant in the park!

subtitles.original: え？公園でぞうさん見つけた？遊具かな？
subtitles.english: Eh? You found an elephant in the park? Like playground equipment?

subtitles.original: そう！お友達がつるつる滑ってた！滑り台だね、それはね。
subtitles.english: Yes! My friends were sliding down it! It was a slide then, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: ぞうさんだ！ぞうさん！喧嘩しない、喧嘩しない。
subtitles.english: It's an elephant! An elephant! Don't fight, don't fight.

subtitles.original: ぞうさんだ、みんな描けたかな？
subtitles.english: It's an elephant, is everyone done drawing?

subtitles.original: みんな、人のだけじゃなくて自分で考えるんだよ。
subtitles.english: Everyone, don't just look at other people's, think for yourselves.

subtitles.original: ということで、みんな描けたかな？
subtitles.english: So, is everyone done drawing?

subtitles.original: 描けたー！描けた！
subtitles.english: Done! Done!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、1人ずつ順番に発表してもらいたいと思います。一番、私が自信あるーっていう人！
subtitles.english: Then, I'd like you to present one by one. Who is the most confident?

subtitles.original: はーい！はーい！はーい！
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Me!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ちょっと子供っぽく「はい」って言った人から指していこうかな。先生、はい、はい！
subtitles.english: Then, I'll pick from someone who said 'Me' in a childlike way. Teacher, me, me!

subtitles.original: あ、先生、美慈（？）ありがとう。じゃあ、かなたちゃん、一番手！
subtitles.english: Ah, Teacher, thank you. Okay, Kanata-chan, you're first!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい、嬉しい、嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm happy, I'm happy, I'm happy!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、かなたちゃんのぞうさんの絵描き歌！
subtitles.english: Then, let's hear Kanata-chan's elephant drawing song!
